name: Jack G
text: Some amenities have changed, but the menu is good. Normally you can find cartoons on the television regardless of the hour. Parties can be hosted with up to thirty guests. Good place for small social gatherings. Under ten dollars a person for most days.

name: Patricia Parker
text: I love Cicis! The employees were extremely polite and very helpful! The food was delicious! We're going back again real soon!

name: Aaron Pridgeon
text: Came here on 12/15 was not impressed the service was below normal. I seen the crew standing around putting their hands in hair then touching the food without washing. Seen employees making their food behind the counter while a customer was …More

name: Cheryl Voight
text: I'm only rating the food as 2 stars but the customer service is a 5+.  The pizza is mediocre, the soup is ok but served at room temperature so by the time you eat half the other half is cold.  The pasta is ok topped with sauce and thank …More

name: Kourtney Grooms
text: Love the different choices of food. My 3 yr old loved it as well. Family oriented

name: joseph Nav
text: Fresh pizza friendly service. Will make you any pizza not on buffet. Can't beat the price!

name: Teresa McCoy
text:
They are great ! Their pizza is good. Salad is always fresh and good. SORRY TO SAY: THEY ARE NO LONGER IN HINESVILLE .
They have moved to Pooler.😞

name: Amanda Baptista
text:
Food is excellent as always, staff is very nice.

*EDIT* The staff is very nice. SUPER nice. But usually the pizza is cold, and there never seems to be noodles for some reason.

name: Gregory Freeman
text: Love this restaurant. Myself, my wife, and our 3-year-old ate, drinks included, for under $18.00. When I came in, I special ordered a Zesty Ham pizza, and they delivered it to our table while we ate the buffet. This place is popping on a Friday night. They also have a good selection of candy machines and video games.

name: David Pierson
text: For a buffet having 2-3 pizzas out shouldn't be an option I know you can do speciallty pizza but I don't want to waste a whole pizza for 2 slices.

name: Yvette Suther
text: The staff was wonderful.  The manager went out of his way to sing my granddaughter happy birthday which was super sweet.

name: Cindy Key
text: Came in at 11:30. No pizza was ready. Pasta and sauces were cold. The lady that rang us up never smiled or greeted us. Seemed like a manager. Will never come back.

name: Jaymion Washington
text: My experience at this location was actually very pleasant. I was helped almost immediately and placed my to go order and gor it all in about 15 minutes, I think, tv distracted me from the time. Food was delicious and the person who helped …More

name: Victoria Thomas
text: We went for a buffet to celebrate my daughter's good grades, the food was constantly coming out, amazing price and the lady was so nice, she said she could make us any pizza we wanted if it's not already there, when we got there it was a …More

name: Ava Jarome
text: Don't know what's up with some of these reviews but this place have the best pizza and many kinds to choose from. Way better then little Caesars I would go here everyday of I had the money like that. Always clean and customer service is great if I could give 10 stars I definitely would. Thanks for the great service

name: Reaux Girt
text: My kids love this place. Not really for adults but I'm happy this place is here for them

name: Difu Wu
text: False advertisement about free buffet for vets on Veteran's Day, designed to lure you to go there only to find out that you actually would have to pay $2.13 for a soft drink in order to get your "free buffet". Who charges $2.13 for a soft drink, and especially to vets? What a scam.

name: Patricia Howton
text: Not a good place to eat . it use to be but now it is not the people that use to run it is not there no more and it has went way down

name: Jorge Lopez-Medina
text: Great food, fast service and helpful staff. Just need a little more time on properly using registers.

name: [SMG]ELITEKNIGHT2003
text: I eat here several times a month freaking love, love, love, pizza. It's good. It's cheap. And I never leave with a empty stomach.

name: saavy156
text: Fast and friendly service. Needs to be more variety on the buffet, so you don't have to wait 10 minutes for them to fix requested food.

name: mangon3wild
text: Local Cici's Pizza, kept very clean. The service was nice and I was asked many times if I wanted any custom order pizzas. One of the better experiences I've had at a Cici's, definitely recommend this location.

text: Went with my family and all the pizza was fresh, the cheese cake brownies are delicious and if there's anything they don't have out that you want, all you have to do is ask and they will make it. Arcade style games, claw machine, etc. For the kids too.

name: Donnae Morris
text:
Staff was friendly and helpful.
Facility is clean.

name: Stephen Jones
text: Food is fine but even if the person is not eating food they require them to pay. Understandable if your trying to prevent theft, but you can do that by watching your customers. Also the prices of the pizza gotten to a point where papa John's or dominos doesn't look so bad.

name: Ryan Crawford
text: Pizza tastes horrible. There were extremely slow in getting out pizzas. Everybody was waiting in line for them to finish cooking pizzas. Multiple people kept saying damn they really dropped the ball tonight. Then this one girl went to go …More

text: I love pizza and I go here a lot with my family as well, I even had my daughters 4th birthday party here and it was great, the food was very delicious and hot, and the games was great as well, and so was the desserts everything was clean and the staff was very friendly even made us a spinach and chicken pizza

text: Pizza's were ok. Staff was friendly,..Some of the dessert pizza's weren't cooked all the way, crust was still gooey. Kinda have the feeling of the restaurant being run down, with how dirty it is inside.

name: Anthony Yeye
text: Take 30min to make bread with cheese  and the pizza no flavor. I like the old staff  better.more friendly.
